UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a customer of the AI E-commerce Growth Agency. This entity holds customer-specific information, including their onboarding progress and marketplace preferences.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

email.description: The unique email address of the customer.

companyName.description: The name of the customer's company or brand.

onboardingStatus.description: The current step or status of the customer's onboarding process (e.g., 'step1', 'completed').

marketplacePreferences.description: A list of marketplaces the customer operates in or is interested in (e.g., 'Amazon', 'Flipkart', 'Myntra').

goals.description: A list of business goals the customer aims to achieve with the AI services (e.g., 'sales', 'CTR', 'conversion', 'listing quality').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an internal employee or administrator of the AI E-commerce Growth Agency, used for internal login and service delivery.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Employee entity.

email.description: The unique email address of the employee.

firstName.description: The first name of the employee.

lastName.description: The last name of the employee.

role.description: The role of the employee within the agency (e.g., 'Admin', 'ServiceAgent', 'Manager').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the employee profile was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the employee profile was last updated.

Website.title: Website
Website.description: Stores a generated website created by the AI Website Builder.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents an overarching engagement or campaign initiated by a customer, under which multiple services and jobs may be executed.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Project entity.

name.description: The name of the project (e.g., 'CHIC ELAN - Q4 Campaign').

description.description: A detailed description of the project's scope and objectives.

userProfileId.description: Reference to the UserProfile entity that owns this project. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N Project)

status.description: The current status of the project (e.g., 'Active', 'Archived', 'Onboarding').

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the project was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the project was last updated.
